title: AccelOps Educates Angelbeat Audiences on the Necessary Convergence of Network and Security Operations
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 3:47 AM   AccelOps 
SANTA CLARA, Calif., Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- In this interconnected, Internet of Things era, a growing community of sophisticated hackers is exceeding the ability of current security tools to quickly identify attacks and their sources. AccelOps today announced its ongoing commitment to educate the industry on the importance of network security and compliance in a world of ever-increasing cyber threats through a series of presentations at Angelbeat seminars across the country. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150519/216996LOGO 
AccelOps brings together the disparate worlds of network performance management and security operations systems and tools by providing a unified solution that encompasses the following: -- Analytics provide real-time correlation of network- and security-impacting threats: Patented machine learning analyzes past and current behavior of systems to understand trends on data inflow, predict performance, leverage knowledge and plan for action. Unified IT infrastructure visibility vastly accelerates problem identification and resolution and provides cross-correlation of data. -- The industry's most powerful automated real-time device discovery engine: The software discovers, identifies and manages all elements connected to the enterprise network including servers, devices, storage, networks, security, applications and users. It creates bi-directional workflow integration into leading IT service management and ticketing solutions and easily scales to meet the needs of both security and network operations teams. -- A multi-tenant architecture that allows users to customize dashboards for diverse physical and logical domains: By integrating AccelOps, managed service providers are able to offer an all-in-one solution for managing and monitoring security, performance and compliance. The software provides a secure, multi-tenant environment that delivers a partitioned view of multiple client networks and real-time visual analytics to assist IT in communicating network analytics to operations and executive teams. -- Quality industry education: The Angelbeat seminar "experience" is unique because of its focus on meeting the educational needs of the attendee. AccelOps is one of many expert speakers that deliver concise, technical and complementary talks on security and compliance, as well as a variety of other hot technology topics. 
Tom Kelly, CEO, AccelOps, said: "While National Cyber Security Awareness month is designed to engage and educate public and private sector partners with the goal of raising awareness about cybersecurity, AccelOps is committed to these efforts year-round. We are dedicated to amplifying the importance of real-time analytics to rapidly identify these inevitable threats and protect overall network and infrastructure performance." 
About AccelOps AccelOps delivers actionable security intelligence for the modern data center. The virtual appliance software monitors security, performance and compliance in cloud and virtualized infrastructures, all on a single screen. AccelOps automatically discovers, analyzes and automates IT issues across organizations' data centers and cloud resources, spanning servers, storage, networks, security, applications and users. AccelOps' patented analytics engine with cross-correlation and statistical anomaly detection sends real-time alerts when deviations occur that indicate a security or performance-impacting event. The AccelOps platform scales seamlessly and provides unmatched delivery of proactive security and operational intelligence, allowing organizations to be more responsive and competitive as they expand their IT capabilities. For details, visit www.accelops.com .
